name: canine
description: Canine is a tool for managing dog data including health records, medical history, and microchip info. It provides a simple UI for pet owners or veterinarians and supports self-hosting to keep sensitive data private.

features.title: Pet Health Records
features.description: Manage dog health records and medical history. Complete pet care

features.title: Medical Tracking
features.description: Track vaccinations, medications, and vet visits. Never miss appointments

features.title: Data Import
features.description: Store microchip and identification details. Important records safe

features.title: Simple Interface
features.description: Easy-to-use UI for pet owners and vets. User-friendly

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Keep sensitive pet data completely private. Data security

features.title: Veterinary Tool
features.description: Useful for both pet owners and veterinarians. Professional solution
